body.head: Over to you
body.p:
In this last practical session, you should test your understanding of what you've learned so far. We suggest you choose one or more of the following tasks
Carry on with your transcription of Passages in the life.... Check carefully for OCR errors, using the oXygen spell checker. If you notice any systematic problems (e.g. the use of asterisks), try using a regular expression to tidy them up.
Try upgrading your transcription from level 0 to level 1. This will mostly involve looking at the hi elements in your document and changing them to more meaningful markup. To validate your document against eltec-1 instead of eltec-0, you can simply edit the ?xml-model line at the start of the file. (But remember to save the document under a different name!)
Tired of 19th century britChickLit? Work on a file you scanned yesterday. How many of the techniques you used today are applicable ?
When you save your ELTeC files, make sure they are valid. .
At the end of the session, we'll compare notes and report experience.
